io.leonis.algieba.spatial

Class UniformFlowPotentialField

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.leonis.algieba.spatial.UniformFlowPotentialField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LineIntegral, ParametricLineIntegral, PotentialField

    public class UniformFlowPotentialField
extends java.lang.Object
implements ParametricLineIntegral, PotentialField
    The Class UniformFlowPotentialField. This class represents a uniform flow PotentialField as proposed in section 2.1 of this paper.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.leonis.algieba.spatial.PotentialField

      • UniformFlowPotentialField

        public UniformFlowPotentialField(org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray origin,
                                 double angle,
                                 double strength)
        Constructs a uniform flow PotentialField.
        Parameters:
        origin - The origin of the PotentialField.
        angle - The angle at which the uniform flow flows.
        strength - The slope of the PotentialField

      • getLineIntegral

        public double getLineIntegral(org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray lowerBound,

        Parameters:
        lowerBound - The lower bound of the integral.
        upperBound - The upper bound of the integral.
        Returns:
